trans-unit.source: Represents a node of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa um nó de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection holds all the child TreeNode objects assigned to the current TreeNode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção contém todos os subordinados objetos TreeNode atribuídos para o atual TreeNode.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or clone a TreeNode; when you do this, all child tree nodes are added, removed, or cloned.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar, remover ou clonar um TreeNode; ao fazê-lo, todos os nós da árvore de subordinados são adicionados, removidos ou clonados.

trans-unit.source: Each TreeNode can contain a collection of other TreeNode objects.
trans-unit.target: Cada TreeNode pode conter uma coleção de outros objetos TreeNode.

trans-unit.source: This can make it difficult to determine where you are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> when iterating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Isto pode dificultar a determinar onde estiver no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>Quando repetir a coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To determine your location in a tree structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar a localização numa estrutura de árvore, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> string can be parsed using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> string value to determine where a TreeNode label begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>cadeia pode ser analisada utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>cadeia o valor para determinar em que uma etiqueta de TreeNode inicia e termina.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNode label is set by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta de TreeNode está definida, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alternative is to create the tree node using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A> constructors that has a string parameter that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A alternativa consiste em criar o nó de árvore através de um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A>construtores que tem um parâmetro de cadeia que representa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The label is displayed next to the TreeNode image, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta é apresentada junto a imagem de TreeNode, se um é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: To display images next to the tree nodes, assign an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and assign an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> by referencing its index value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> property.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar imagens junto a nós de árvore, atribua um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar e atribuir um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>ao consultar o valor de índice no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> you want to display when the TreeNode is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice de <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que pretende apresentar quando o TreeNode está num Estado não seleccionado.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Likewise, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property to the index value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Image> you want to display when the TreeNode is selected.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade para o valor de índice de <xref:System.Drawing.Image>que pretende apresentar quando o TreeNode está selecionada.</xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Selecting specific tree nodes and iterating through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A> collection can be achieved by using the following property values: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Selecionar nós da árvore específico e repetir a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>coleção pode ser conseguida utilizando os seguintes valores de propriedade: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevVisibleNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextVisibleNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.PrevNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.NextNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.LastNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FirstNode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Assign the TreeNode returned by one of aforementioned properties to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to select that tree node in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: Atribuir TreeNode devolvido por uma das propriedades acima mencionadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para selecionar esse nó da árvore de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can be expanded to display the next level of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Nós da árvore podem ser expandidos para apresentar o próximo nível de nós da árvore de subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The user can expand the TreeNode by pressing the plus (+) button next to the TreeNode, if one is displayed, or you can expand the TreeNode by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode expandir o TreeNode, premindo o sinal de adição (+) botão junto TreeNode, se um é apresentado ou pode expandir o TreeNode ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To expand all child tree node levels in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para expandir a todos os níveis de nó de árvore subordinada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção, chamada o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ExpandAll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can collapse the child TreeNode level by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A> method, or the user can press the minus (-) button next to the TreeNode, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Pode fechar o subordinado TreeNode nível ao chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>método ou o utilizador pode premir o sinal de subtração (-) junto a TreeNode, se um é apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A> method to alternate the TreeNode between the expanded and collapsed states.
trans-unit.target: Também pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A>método alternativo TreeNode entre os Estados expandidos e fechados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Toggle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Tree nodes can optionally display a check box.
trans-unit.target: Nós de árvore, opcionalmente, podem apresentar uma caixa de verificação.

trans-unit.source: To display the check boxes, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para apresentar as caixas de verificação, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property is set to `true` for tree nodes that are in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade está definida como `true` para nós da árvore que estão num estado marcado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto da etiqueta especificada.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e torna-se a etiqueta de nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>no novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class using the specified serialization information and context.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> utilizando as informações de serialização especificado e o contexto de classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the data to deserialize the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados para a classe de anular a serialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem e destino de fluxo serializado.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text and child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe connosco de árvore de texto e subordinado de etiqueta especificada.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e torna-se a etiqueta de nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes that are contained in the `children` array are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that is stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os nós da árvore que estão contidos no `children` matriz são adicionados à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>que é armazenado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>no novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: An array of child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz dos subordinados <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text and images to display when the tree node is in a selected and unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto da etiqueta especificada e imagens a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está num Estado não seleccionado e selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e torna-se a etiqueta de nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `imageIndex` and `selectedImageIndex` values are the index values of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O `imageIndex` e `selectedImageIndex` os valores são os valores de índice de uma <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuídos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The image referenced in the `imageIndex` property is displayed when the tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: A imagem referenciada no `imageIndex` propriedade é apresentada quando o nó da árvore não estiver seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the image referenced in the `selectedImageIndex` property is displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a imagem referenciada no `selectedImageIndex` propriedade é apresentada quando o nó da árvore está num Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>no novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is unselected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> class with the specified label text, child tree nodes, and images to display when the tree node is in a selected and unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> classe com o texto da etiqueta especificada, nós da árvore de subordinados e imagens a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está num Estado não seleccionado e selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The `text` parameter value is assigned to the node's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and becomes the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O `text` valor do parâmetro é atribuído para o nó <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>propriedade e torna-se a etiqueta de nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `imageIndex` and `selectedImageIndex` values are the index values of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O `imageIndex` e `selectedImageIndex` os valores são os valores de índice de uma <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuídos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: The image referenced in the `imageIndex` parameter is displayed when the tree node is not selected.
trans-unit.target: A imagem referenciada no `imageIndex` parâmetro é apresentado quando o nó da árvore não estiver seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the image referenced in the `selectedImageIndex` parameter is displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, a imagem referenciada no `selectedImageIndex` parâmetro é apresentado quando o nó da árvore está num Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The tree nodes that are contained in the `children` array are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> that is stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os nós da árvore que estão contidos no `children` matriz são adicionados à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>que é armazenado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The label <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*> of the new tree node.
trans-unit.target: A etiqueta <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>no novo nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Text*>

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is unselected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The index value of <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display when the tree node is selected.
trans-unit.target: O valor de índice <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> a apresentar quando o nó da árvore está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: An array of child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz dos subordinados <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de fundo do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the BackColor property is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the tree node is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade BackColor é definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>é utilizado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>valor da propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo que o nó da árvore está atribuído.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color> </xref:System.Drawing.Color?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: A imagem de fundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the editing of the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a edição da etiqueta do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A typical scenario to use this method is to call it on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário típico para utilizar este método é chamá-lo sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>evento de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.Click>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method only works if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Este método só funciona se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>está definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A> is set to `false`, an exception is thrown and the tree node will not be put into an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>está definido como `false`, é emitida uma exceção e o nó da árvore não será colocado num estado editável.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.LabelEdit%2a?displayProperty=fullName> está definido como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas são uma relativo para o canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the tree node is in a checked state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o nó da árvore está num estado marcado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in a checked state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore está num estado marcado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the tree node and the entire subtree rooted at this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Copia o nó de árvore e subárvore completa Root neste nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The tree structure from the tree node being cloned and below is copied.
trans-unit.target: A estrutura de árvore do nó da árvore que está a ser clonado e abaixo é copiada.

trans-unit.source: Any child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> being cloned are included in the new tree node and subtree.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum nó de árvore subordinado atribuídos ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>que está a ser clonado estão incluídos no novo nó de árvore e subárvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The Clone method performs a shallow copy of the node.
trans-unit.target: O método de Clone efetua uma cópia shallow do nó.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> property is a reference type, both the original and cloned copy will point to the same single instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>propriedade é um tipo de referência, cópia original e clonada irá apontar para a mesma instância única do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Collapses the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Collapse method collapses the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> and its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: O método de fechar fecha atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>e respetivos nós subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If you want to collapse only the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload, passing `true` to ignore its child nodes.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender fechar apenas atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>sobrecarga, transmitir `true` ignore os nós subordinados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Collapse%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós subordinados não foi fechado anteriormente, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método é denominado, os nós subordinados são apresentados no respetivo estado expandido anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Collapses the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> and optionally collapses its children.
trans-unit.target: Fecha o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, fecha respetivos grupos subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Use the Collapse method, passing `true`, when you want to collapse a node but leave its child nodes in their expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de fechar, transmitir `true`, quando pretender fechar um nó, mas deixe o subordinado nós no respetivo estado expandido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to leave the child nodes in their current state; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to collapse the child nodes.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para deixar o subordinado nós no respetivo estado atual; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para fechar os nós subordinados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the shortcut menu that is associated with this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o menu de atalho que está associado este nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to associate a shortcut menu with a tree node is with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: É a forma preferencial para associar um menu de atalho com um nó de árvore com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that is associated with the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> que está associado ao nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o menu de atalho associado este nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The shortcut menu is shown when the user right-clicks the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O menu de atalho apresentado quando o utilizador right-clicks o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> associated with the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> associadas com o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> de especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que descreve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the state of the stream during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica o estado do fluxo de durante a desserialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Ends the editing of the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Termina a edição da etiqueta do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the editing of the tree node label text was canceled without being saved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se editar o texto da etiqueta do nó da árvore foi cancelada sem a ser guardadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the tree node is visible, expanding tree nodes and scrolling the tree view control as necessary.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o nó da árvore está visível, nós da árvore de expansão e deslocamento de controlo de vista de árvore, conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: When the EnsureVisible method is called, the tree is expanded and scrolled to ensure that the current tree node is visible in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando se chama o método EnsureVisible, a árvore é expandido e deslocamento para se certificar de que o nó de árvore atual está visível no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This method is useful if you are selecting a tree node in code based on certain criteria.
trans-unit.target: Este método é útil se estão a selecionar um nó de árvore no código com base em determinados critérios.

trans-unit.source: By calling this method after you select the node, the user can see and interact with the selected node.
trans-unit.target: Ao chamar este método depois de selecionar o nó, o utilizador pode ver e interagir com o nó selecionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value that is larger than the height of the tree view control, calling this method has unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida como um valor que excede a altura do controlo de vista de árvore, chamar este método tem resultados inesperados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ItemHeight%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Expands the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Expandir o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Expand method expands the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> down to the next level of nodes.
trans-unit.target: O método de expansão expande atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>para baixo para o próximo nível de nós.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the Expand method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós secundários não foi fechado anteriormente, quando o método de expansão é chamado, os nós subordinados são apresentados no respetivo estado expandido anteriormente.

trans-unit.source: Expands all the child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Expande todos os nós da árvore de subordinados.

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method expands all the child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O método ExpandAll expande todos os nós de árvore subordinada atribuídos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The state of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is persisted.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O estado de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é persistente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the next level of child nodes was not collapsed previously, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A> method is called, the child nodes appear in their previously expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o próximo nível de nós subordinados não foi fechado anteriormente, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>método é denominado, os nós subordinados são apresentados no respetivo estado expandido anteriormente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Expand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the first child tree node in the tree node collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro subordinado nó da árvore na coleção de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The FirstNode is the first child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O FirstNode é o primeiro subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade atual nó da árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> has no child tree node, the FirstNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem nenhum nó de árvore subordinada, a propriedade FirstNode devolve `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The first child <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro subordinado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `null`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the tree node is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Se `null`, a <xref:System.Drawing.Color>é utilizado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>valor da propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo que o nó da árvore está atribuído.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The foreground <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro plano <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Returns the tree node with the specified handle and assigned to the specified tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o nó da árvore especificado com processar e atribuídos à árvore de especificado ver controlo.

trans-unit.source: When a node is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control sends an NM_CUSTOMDRAW notification before the node handle is available.
trans-unit.target: Quando é adicionado um nó para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo envia uma notificação de NM_CUSTOMDRAW antes do identificador de nó está disponível.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.Nodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to provide custom drawing in response to this notification, you should always check the return value of this method for `null` before you attempt to access the node.
trans-unit.target: Se substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para fornecer o desenho personalizado em resposta a esta notificação, deve verificar sempre o valor de retorno deste método para `null` antes de tentar aceder ao nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> that contains the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> que contém o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The handle of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the tree node assigned to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control with the specified handle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó da árvore atribuído especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo com o identificador especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path from the root tree node to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho a partir do nó da árvore de raiz para o atual nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The path consists of the labels of all the tree nodes that must be navigated to reach this tree node, starting at the root tree node.
trans-unit.target: O caminho é composta por das etiquetas de todos os nós da árvore que devem ser direcionados para aceder a este nó de árvore, começando no nó raiz da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The node labels are separated by the delimiter character specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that contains this node.
trans-unit.target: As etiquetas de nó são separadas pelo caráter delimitador especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo que contém este nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the delimiter character of the tree view control named "Location" is set to the backslash character, (\\), the FullPath property value is "Country\Region\State".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o caráter delimitador do controlo de vista de árvore com o nome "Localização" está definido como o caráter de barra invertida (\\), o valor da propriedade FullPath é "Country\Region\State".

trans-unit.source: The path from the root tree node to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do nó da árvore de raiz para o atual nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The node is not contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nó não está contido num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of child tree nodes.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o número de nós da árvore de subordinados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the resulting count includes all tree nodes indirectly rooted at this tree node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a contagem de resultante inclui todos os nós da árvore indiretamente Root neste nó de árvore; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of child tree nodes assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de nós de árvore subordinada atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If a handle is not already created when the Handle property is referenced, it is created.
trans-unit.target: Se um identificador não tiver sido criado quando a propriedade identificador está referenciada, é criado.

trans-unit.source: The tree node handle.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed when the tree node is in the unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagem da imagem apresentada quando o nó da árvore está no Estado não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The ImageIndex value is the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de ImageIndex é o valor de índice um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default value of the ImageIndex property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor predefinido da propriedade ImageIndex é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>está atribuído a.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> and ImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive; therefore, if one property is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>e ImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas; por conseguinte, se for definida uma propriedade, o outro é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> property, the ImageIndex property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>propriedade, a propriedade ImageIndex é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir ImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the image position in the assigned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a posição da imagem a atribuído no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key for the image associated with this tree node when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave para a imagem associada este nó de árvore quando o nó está num Estado não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The image key returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the containing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem devolvida por esta propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade de que o contém <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: O ImageKey é sensível.

trans-unit.source: The ImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive; if one property is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O ImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas se for definida uma propriedade, outros são ignoradas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the ImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade ImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>propriedade é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>, ImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>, ImageKey é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key for the image associated with this tree node when the node is in an unselected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave para a imagem associada este nó de árvore quando o nó está num Estado não seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the tree node in the tree node collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição do nó da árvore na coleção de nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the tree node in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a posição do nó na árvore de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in an editable state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó da árvore está num estado editável.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in editable state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore está no estado editável; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in the expanded state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó da árvore está no estado expandido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in the expanded state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore está no estado expandido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is in the selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó da árvore está no estado seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is in the selected state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore está no estado seleccionado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the tree node is visible or partially visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o nó da árvore está visível ou parcialmente visível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tree node is visible or partially visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o nó da árvore está visível ou parcialmente visível; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last child tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último subordinado nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The LastNode is the last child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: O LastNode é o último subordinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade atual nó da árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> has no child tree node, the LastNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>não tem nenhum nó de árvore subordinada, a propriedade LastNode devolve `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the last child tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o último nó de árvore subordinada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based depth of the tree node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a profundidade baseado em zero do nó na árvore de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: For the Level property, the root node is considered the first level of nesting and returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Para a propriedade nível, o nó de raiz é considerado o primeiro nível de aninhamento e devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based depth of the tree node in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A profundidade baseado em zero do nó na árvore de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The Name of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is also the node's key, when the node is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: O nome de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>é também o nó chave, quando o nó faz parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the node does not have a name, Name returns an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se o nó não tem um nome, o nome devolve uma cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the name of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que representa o nome do nó da árvore.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the next sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o colateral seguinte nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The NextNode is the next sibling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the tree node's parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: O NextNode é o seguinte colateral <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenadas na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do principal do nó da árvore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If there is no next tree node, the NextNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore seguinte, a propriedade NextNode devolve `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the next sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore colateral seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o próximo nó de árvore visível.

trans-unit.source: The NextVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch.
trans-unit.target: O NextVisibleNode pode ser um elemento subordinado, colateral ou um nó de árvore do ramo de outro.

trans-unit.source: If there is no next tree node, the NextVisibleNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore seguinte, a propriedade NextVisibleNode devolve `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the next visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore visível seguinte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font that is used to display the text on the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de letra utilizado para apresentar o texto na etiqueta do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: If `null`, the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> used is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that this node is attached to.
trans-unit.target: Se `null`, a <xref:System.Drawing.Font>é utilizado o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>valor da propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo que este nó está ligado ao.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the node font is larger than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A> property value that is set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, the tree node label text is clipped.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o tipo de letra do nó é maior do que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>valor da propriedade que está definido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo, o texto da etiqueta do nó da árvore está anexado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Font%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that is used to display the text on the tree node label.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> que é utilizado para apresentar o texto na etiqueta do nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects assigned to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> atribuídos para o atual nó de árvore de objetos.

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property can hold a collection of other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nós pode manter uma coleção de outras <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Each of the tree node in the collection has a Nodes property that can contain its own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Cada nó da árvore na colecção tem uma propriedade de nós que pode conter os seus próprios <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This nesting of tree nodes can make it difficult to navigate a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: Este aninhamento de nós da árvore pode dificultar navegar uma estrutura de árvore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A> property makes it easier to determine your location in a tree.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>propriedade torna mais fácil determinar a localização numa árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.FullPath%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that represents the tree nodes assigned to the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> que representa os nós da árvore atribuídos para o atual nó de árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent tree node of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o principal nó da árvore atual nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: If the tree node is at the root level, the Parent property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó da árvore está no nível de raiz, a propriedade principal devolve `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the parent of the current tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o principal atual nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o colateral anterior nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The PrevNode is the previous sibling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> property of the tree node's parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: O PrevNode é o anterior colateral <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection>armazenadas na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A>propriedade do principal do nó da árvore <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous tree node, the PrevNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore anterior, a propriedade PrevNode devolve `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the previous sibling tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore colateral anterior.

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nó de árvore visível anterior.

trans-unit.source: The PrevVisibleNode can be a child, sibling, or a tree node from another branch.
trans-unit.target: O PrevVisibleNode pode ser um elemento subordinado, colateral ou um nó de árvore do ramo de outro.

trans-unit.source: If there is no previous tree node, the PrevVisibleNode property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum nó de árvore anterior, a propriedade PrevVisibleNode devolve `null`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the previous visible tree node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> que representa o nó de árvore visível anterior.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current tree node from the tree view control.
trans-unit.target: Remove o nó de árvore atual do controlo de vista de árvore.

trans-unit.source: When the Remove method is called, the tree node, and any child tree nodes that are assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado o método de remover, o nó de árvore e quaisquer nós de árvore de subordinados que são atribuídos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>são removidas da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The removed child nodes are removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> but are still attached to this tree node.
trans-unit.target: Os nós subordinados removido são removidos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>, mas ainda estão anexados a este nó de árvore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image that is displayed when the tree node is in the selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de índice de lista de imagem da imagem que é apresentado quando o nó da árvore está no estado seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: The SelectedImageIndex value is the index value of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de SelectedImageIndex é o valor de índice um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>armazenados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The default value of the SelectedImageIndex property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O valor predefinido da propriedade SelectedImageIndex é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlar que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>está atribuído a.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.SelectedImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the image position in an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice baseado em zero que representa a posição da imagem num <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image displayed in the tree node when it is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem apresentada no nó de árvore, quando faz parte de um Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The image key returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem devolvida por esta propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.ImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key of the image displayed when the tree node is in a selected state.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem apresentada quando o nó da árvore está num Estado selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> para especificado <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that describes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que descreve o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that indicates the state of the stream during serialization
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que indica o estado do fluxo de durante a serialização</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> when the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice da imagem que é utilizado para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> quando principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>

trans-unit.source: The image index that is returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de imagem que é devolvido por esta propriedade está contido no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has check boxes enabled, the StateImageIndex is ignored and the node will display the first or second image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem caixas de verificação ativadas, o StateImageIndex é ignorada e o nó irá apresentar a imagem do primeira ou segundo no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>defina na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para indicar um Estado marcado ou desmarcado, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property does not affect the value of the StateImageIndex.
trans-unit.target: Ativando ou desativando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade não afeta o valor da StateImageIndex.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StateImageIndex returns -1 when not set.
trans-unit.target: O StateImageIndex devolve -1 quando não definido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> and StateImageIndex properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>e StateImageIndex propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que o se um estiver definido, o outro é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> property, the StateImageIndex property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>propriedade, a propriedade StateImageIndex é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set StateImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A> is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir StateImageIndex, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O índice da imagem que é utilizado para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is less than -1 or greater than 14.
trans-unit.target: O índice especificado é inferior a -1 ou superior a 14.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> when the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"></xref> has its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a chave da imagem que é utilizada para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref> quando principal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeView"> </xref> tem respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>propriedade definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.CheckBoxes*>

trans-unit.source: The image key that is returned by this property is contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A chave de imagem que é devolvida por esta propriedade está contida no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>propriedade do principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> has check boxes enabled, the StateImageKey is ignored and the node will display the first or second image in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> set on the parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> to indicate an unchecked or checked state, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Se o principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>tem caixas de verificação ativadas, o StateImageKey é ignorada e o nó irá apresentar a imagem do primeira ou segundo no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A>defina na principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>para indicar um Estado marcado ou desmarcado, respetivamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.StateImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A> property does not affect the value of the StateImageKey.
trans-unit.target: Ativando ou desativando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>propriedade não afeta o valor da StateImageKey.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: The StateImageKey and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> properties are mutually exclusive, meaning if one is set, the other is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O StateImageKey e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas, que significa que o se um estiver definido, o outro é ignorado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the StateImageKey property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A> property is automatically set to -1.
trans-unit.target: Se definir a propriedade StateImageKey, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>propriedade é automaticamente definida como -1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>, StateImageKey is automatically set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Em alternativa, se definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>, StateImageKey é automaticamente definido como uma cadeia vazia ("").</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.StateImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: You should set the StateImageKey to an image with a corresponding index between 0 and 14.
trans-unit.target: Deve definir o StateImageKey para uma imagem com um índice correspondente entre 0 e 14.

trans-unit.source: You can set the StateImageKey to an image with an index value greater than 14 (an exception will not be thrown), but the image may not be displayed
trans-unit.target: É possível definir o StateImageKey como uma imagem com um valor de índice superior a 14 (não será emitida uma exceção), mas a imagem não pode ser apresentada

trans-unit.source: The key of the image that is used to indicate the state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave da imagem que é utilizada para indicar o estado do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a serialization information object with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um objeto de informações de serialização com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the data to serialize the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém os dados para serializar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination information for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém as informações de destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto que contém dados sobre o nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Object> derived type can be assigned to this property.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer <xref:System.Object>tipo derivado pode ser atribuído a esta propriedade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If this property is being set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade está a ser definida através do estruturador de Windows Forms, texto só pode ser atribuído.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A> method performs a shallow copy of the node.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A>método efetua uma cópia shallow do nó.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the Tag property is a reference type, both the original and cloned copy will point to the same single instance of the Tag value.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor da propriedade etiqueta é um tipo de referência, tanto a cópia do original e clonada irá apontar para a mesma instância única do valor da etiqueta.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o nó da árvore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the label of the tree node.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto apresentado na etiqueta do nó da árvore.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode> can display is 259.
trans-unit.target: O número máximo de carateres que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>pode apresentar é 259.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.String> that has more than 259 characters is assigned to this property, only the first 259 characters are displayed.
